message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $15,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer and understand the value of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering my budget and the current market situation, I am willing to offer $11,000 for the product.
